title: Life after the historical thesaurus of the Oxford English Dictionary

references.title: A Thesaurus of Old English.
references.raw: Roberts, Jane and Christian Kay with Lynne Grundy. 1995. A Thesaurus of Old English. (= King’s College London Medieval Studies XI.) Second edition, 2000. Amsterdam: Rodopi.

references.title: Constructing a Thesaurus Database.
references.raw: Kay, Christian and Thomas J. P. Chase. 1987. Constructing a Thesaurus Database. Literary and Linguistic Computing 2: 161–163.

references.title: Historical Thesaurus Database Using Ingres. Literary and Linguistic Computing 7: 218–225. Wotherspoon, Irené. Forthcoming. The Making of the Historical Thesaurus of the Oxford English Dictionary.

references.title: Historical Thesaurus of the Oxford English Dictionary.

references.title: The Historical Thesaurus of English.
references.raw: Collier, Leslie and Christian Kay. 1980. The Historical Thesaurus of English. Dictionaries 2/3: 88–112.
